com.mpos.lottery.te.valueaddservice.vat.service

接口 VatCreditService

  • 所有已知实现类:
    VatCreditServiceImpl

    public interface VatCreditService

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      VatTransferDto vatTransferCredit(Context respCtx, VatTransferDto dto)
      There are 2 kinds of credit: sale and payout.

    • 方法详细资料

      • vatTransferCredit

        VatTransferDto vatTransferCredit(Context respCtx,
                               VatTransferDto dto)
                                 throws ApplicationException
        There are 2 kinds of credit: sale and payout. Sale and its corresponding cancellation will affect sale credit, payout/validation and its corresponding cancellation will affect payout credit.

        Refer to CreditService.credit(String, long, BigDecimal, String, boolean, boolean, boolean) for more information.

        抛出:
        ApplicationException
